scripts.build: yarn run build:es && yarn run build:cjs && yarn run build:server
scripts.build:es: rimraf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs
scripts.build:server: rimraf server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=node-cjs babel server-src --out-dir server
scripts.watch: rimraf dist/es && rimraf server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src -w --out-dir dist/es & cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel server-src -w --out-dir server
